result.reason: Per-folder password protection is a significant architectural feature (requires new auth model, UI, persistence changes) that goes beyond bug fixing scope and conflicts with the existing master password model; labeled 'Enhancement' from 2019 with no community traction.
result.approach: Decline as out-of-scope for current release cycle; suggest user use OS-level ACLs or separate connection files as workaround
